original_text: And I came to the exiles at Tel-abib, who were dwelling by the Chebar canal, and I sat where they were dwelling. And I sat there overwhelmed among them seven days.
korean_text: 이에 내가 델아빕에 이르러 그 사로잡힌 백성 곧 그발 강 가에 거주하는 자들에게 나아가 그 중에서 두려워 떨며 칠 일을 지내니라

sentences.original_text: And I came to the exiles at Tel-abib,
who were dwelling by the Chebar canal,
and I sat where they were dwelling.
And I sat there overwhelmed among them seven days.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 가운데 앉아서 칠 일 동안 경악에 잠겨 있었다.
